Name: Block Wizard
About the game: WARNING : This game contains flashing images that some users may find uncomfortable. It may not be suitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Please be advised before playing. Info: Block Wizard is an arcade puzzle game that aims to challenge both your wits and speed ! As you awaken inside the fiendish labyrinth, the only goal in sight is a flight of stairs. What awaits on the other side? Features: Race through each one of the 100 floors , and climb to the top, avoiding the nightmares in your way. Change between a retro look or modern pixel art! Solve challenging puzzles using your unique ability to modify the environment at will with your magic! Play using responsive controls requiring precision and speed ! Use the in-game clock to beat your own scores! What's the fastest you can climb? DEMO FEATURES Experience the first 20 levels Carry over your progress to the full game! FULL GAME Unlock all 100 levels! Save your highscore on the leaderboards ! Use Level Select to practice any stage you want! Set the best score for each Wing and top the leaderboards ! Use CHAOS mode to face every floor in a randomized order for a true test of skill. Pickups from previous levels do NOT carry over. Are you the real Block Wizard?
